displayName: Power BI REST API Integration Server
description: Enable AI assistants to manage and interact with Microsoft Power BI resources such as workspaces, reports, dashboards, datasets, and more through a unified interface. Perform advanced operations including exporting reports, executing DAX queries, and generating embed tokens. Access any Power BI or Microsoft Graph API endpoint dynamically for complete API flexibility.

GRAPH_CLIENT_ID.description: Microsoft Graph API OAuth 2.0 client ID (optional, for OAuth authentication)

GRAPH_TENANT_ID.description: Microsoft Graph API OAuth 2.0 tenant ID (optional, for OAuth authentication)

GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Microsoft Graph API access token (optional, for Graph API operations)

GRAPH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Microsoft Graph API OAuth 2.0 client secret (optional, for OAuth authentication)

POWERBI_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Power BI access token for API authentication

tools.name: get_workspaces
tools.description: Get all available Power BI workspaces

tools.name: create_workspace
tools.title: Create Power BI Workspace
tools.description: Create a new Power BI workspace

tools.name: update_workspace
tools.title: Update Power BI Workspace
tools.description: Update a Power BI workspace

tools.name: delete_workspace
tools.title: Delete Power BI Workspace
tools.description: Delete a Power BI workspace

tools.name: add_workspace_user
tools.title: Add User to Power BI Workspace
tools.description: Add a user to a Power BI workspace

tools.name: update_workspace_user
tools.title: Update User Access in Power BI Workspace
tools.description: Update a user's access in a Power BI workspace

tools.name: delete_workspace_user
tools.title: Remove User from Power BI Workspace
tools.description: Remove a user from a Power BI workspace

tools.name: get_reports
tools.title: Get Power BI Reports
tools.description: Get reports from a Power BI workspace

tools.name: get_report
tools.title: Get Power BI Report Details
tools.description: Get details of a specific Power BI report

tools.name: export_report
tools.title: Export Power BI Report
tools.description: Export a Power BI report to various formats

tools.name: get_dashboards
tools.title: Get Power BI Dashboards
tools.description: Get dashboards from a Power BI workspace

tools.name: get_dashboard
tools.title: Get Power BI Dashboard Details
tools.description: Get details of a specific Power BI dashboard

tools.name: get_dashboard_tiles
tools.title: Get Power BI Dashboard Tiles
tools.description: Get tiles from a Power BI dashboard

tools.name: get_datasets
tools.title: Get Power BI Datasets
tools.description: Get datasets from a Power BI workspace

tools.name: execute_dax
tools.title: Execute DAX Query
tools.description: Execute a DAX query against a Power BI dataset

tools.name: refresh_dataset
tools.title: Refresh Power BI Dataset
tools.description: Trigger a refresh of a Power BI dataset

tools.name: get_dataset
tools.title: Get Power BI Dataset Details
tools.description: Get details of a specific Power BI dataset

tools.name: get_data_sources
tools.title: Get Power BI Dataset Data Sources
tools.description: Get data sources for a Power BI dataset

tools.name: get_refresh_history
tools.title: Get Dataset Refresh History
tools.description: Get refresh history for a Power BI dataset

tools.name: get_apps
tools.title: Get Power BI Apps
tools.description: Get all Power BI apps

tools.name: get_app
tools.title: Get Power BI App Details
tools.description: Get details of a specific Power BI app

tools.name: get_capacities
tools.title: Get Power BI Capacities
tools.description: Get all Power BI capacities

tools.name: get_gateways
tools.title: Get Data Gateways
tools.description: Get all data gateways

tools.name: get_gateway
tools.title: Get Data Gateway Details
tools.description: Get details of a specific data gateway

tools.name: get_dataflows
tools.title: Get Power BI Dataflows
tools.description: Get dataflows from a workspace

tools.name: get_imports
tools.title: Get Power BI Imports
tools.description: Get imports from a workspace

tools.name: get_embed_token
tools.title: Generate Power BI Embed Token
tools.description: Generate an embed token for Power BI content

tools.name: clone_report
tools.title: Clone Power BI Report
tools.description: Clone a Power BI report to a different workspace

tools.name: configure_graph_oauth
tools.title: Configure Microsoft Graph OAuth 2.0
tools.description: Configure OAuth 2.0 authentication for Microsoft Graph API using client credentials flow. This enables automatic token management and refresh for Graph API operations.

tools.name: get_graph_oauth_token
tools.title: Get Microsoft Graph OAuth Token
tools.description: Manually obtain a new OAuth 2.0 access token for Microsoft Graph API. Useful for testing authentication or refreshing tokens.

tools.name: set_graph_token
tools.title: Set Microsoft Graph API Token
tools.description: Set a static Microsoft Graph API access token manually. This is an alternative to OAuth 2.0 configuration.

tools.name: set_powerbi_token
tools.title: Set Power BI API Token
tools.description: Set a static Power BI API access token manually.

tools.name: dynamic_endpoints_power_bi_assistant
tools.title: Dynamic Power BI API Assistant
tools.description: Universal tool to interact with any Power BI REST API endpoint or Microsoft Graph API. Supports all HTTP methods, custom headers, query parameters, and request bodies. Perfect for advanced operations not covered by specific tools.
